Most Illustrious and Excellent Sir

I inform Your Excellency that Lieutenant Isaías Antônio Alz., Ensign Antônio Joaquim da Cruz, Antônio José de Carvalho and 16 soldiers, all of the corps under my command, went to Fundo in order to surprise a guard of the rebels who were there, commanded by Lieutenant Nogueira, taking 4 prisoners and seizing 6 saddled horses, with other men escaping through the woods.

This is what I have the honor to communicate to Your Excellency.  
Fundo, December 17, 1839.

Most Illustrious and Excellent Sir Filipe Neri de Oliveira, Brigadier Commander of the 2nd Brigade.  
Francisco Pedro de Abreu. Lieutenant Colonel.
